The entire Direct-TO staff would like to wish you a happy holiday season and a prosperous New Year. It's been a busy 2014 for Direct-TO, as we moved to our new home on the Honeywell Pilot Gateway (https://pilots.honeywell.com <Https://Pilots.Honeywell.Com>) and added new features including “Engine Insights”. As a company, we celebrated 100 years in aviation and launched several new products and services. Looking forward to the next 100 years of innovation, you can count on Direct-TO to continue reporting important Honeywell, industry, and regulatory news. We’ll see you in 2015!
